# wo-switch

## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description    | Type      | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | -------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `activeColor`   | `active-color`   |                | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `checked`       | `checked`        |                | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`       | 是否禁用           | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `inactiveColor` | `inactive-color` | 关闭时的背景色        | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `loading`       | `loading`        | 是否处于loading状态  | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `loadingColor`  | `loading-color`  | loading 时的背景颜色 | `string`  | `'#ff976a'` |
| `size`          | `size`           | 开关大小           | `string`  | `'16px'`    |


## Events

| Event    | Description | Type                |
| -------- | ----------- | ------------------- |
| `change` | 对外提供当前模式数据  | `CustomEvent<void>` |
